title: Finding Joy at the Hollywood Bowl
description:
When Gil Roscoe needed something to take his mind off his grief, he decided to apply for a new job. He had no idea it would lead to a whole new world that would reopen his heart.

Find Gil’s novels on Amazon, or read his essay in the LA Times

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
